trans-unit.source: Specifies the style that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> uses to indicate the progress of an operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 用來表示作業進度的樣式。

trans-unit.source: You can use the marquee style when you need to indicate progress is being made, but you cannot indicate the quantity of progress.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要以指出正在進行時，但您不能指出進度的數量時，您可以使用跑馬燈樣式。

trans-unit.source: The Marquee style is valid only when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 跑馬燈樣式是有效的只有在已啟用視覺化樣式時。

trans-unit.source: The Continuous style is valid only when visual styles are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 只有在未啟用視覺化樣式時，才連續樣式是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates progress by increasing the number of segmented blocks in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 增加 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 中的分段區塊數，以表示進度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates progress by increasing the size of a smooth, continuous bar in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 增加 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 中的平滑連續列大小，以表示進度。

trans-unit.source: Indicates progress by continuously scrolling a block across a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> in a marquee fashion.
trans-unit.target: 以跑馬燈形式在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 中連續捲動區塊，以表示進度。
